Bash(PGPASSWORD="npg_OsE4Z2oPCpiT" psql "postgresql://Marketing%20DB_owner@ep-ancient-waterfall-a42vy0du-pooler.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech:5432/Marketing%20DB?sslmode=require" -c "
-- Phase 0: Schema Inventory
-- Step 1: Check if funnel schema exists and list tables
SELECT schemaname, tablename 
FROM pg_catalog.pg_tables 
WHERE schemaname = ''funnel''
ORDER BY tablename;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="npg_OsE4Z2oPCpiT" psql "postgresql://Marketing%20DB_owner@ep-ancient-waterfall-a42vy0du-pooler.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech:5432/Marketing%20DB?sslmode=require" -c "
-- Create CL schema namespace
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS cl;

-- CL Company Identity - Sovereign table
CREATE TABLE cl.company_identity \(
    company_unique_id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid\(\),
    
    company_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    company_domain TEXT NULL,
    linkedin_company_url TEXT NULL,
    
    source_system TEXT NOT NULL,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT now\(\)
\);

-- Admission Gate Constraint \(domain OR linkedin required\)
ALTER TABLE cl.company_identity
ADD CONSTRAINT cl_identity_admission_gate
CHECK \(
    company_domain IS NOT NULL
    OR linkedin_company_url IS NOT NULL
\);

-- Indexes
CREATE INDEX idx_cl_company_domain
ON cl.company_identity \(company_domain\);

CREATE INDEX idx_cl_company_linkedin
ON cl.company_identity \(linkedin_company_url\);

-- Verify
SELECT ''CL schema created successfully'' AS status;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="npg_OsE4Z2oPCpiT" psql "postgresql://Marketing%20DB_owner@ep-ancient-waterfall-a42vy0du-pooler.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech:5432/Marketing%20DB?sslmode=require" -c "
-- PHASE 1: Inventory all tables in outreach.* schema
SELECT 
    table_name,
    \(SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM information_schema.columns c WHERE c.table_schema = ''outreach'' AND c.table_name = t.table_name\) as column_count
FROM information_schema.tables t
WHERE table_schema = ''outreach''
ORDER BY table_name;
")
